extracted_playbook.title: Implement ASD Essential Eight Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the ASD Essential Eight Controls and associated Strategies to Mitigate Cyber Security Incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Implement Windows Event Logging and Forwarding
extracted_playbook.description: Review and implement guidance on Windows Event Logging and Forwarding, including configuration files and scripts in the Windows Event Logging Repository and the Information Security Manualâ€™s Guidelines for System Monitoring.

extracted_playbook.title: Patch Internet Exposed Devices and Services
extracted_playbook.description: Promptly patch all internet exposed devices and services, including web servers, web applications, and remote access gateways. Consider implementing a centralized patch management system to automate and expedite the process.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to limit or block lateral movement by denying traffic between computers unless required. Important servers such as Active Directory should only be administered from a limited number of intermediary servers or 'jump servers'.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Network Services and Enforce Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused or unnecessary network services, ports, and protocols. Enforce least privilege to limit access to servers, file shares, and other resources.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Web Application Firewalls (WAFs)
extracted_playbook.description: Use well-tuned Web Application Firewalls (WAFs) to protect web servers and applications.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Use multi-factor authentication (MFA) and managed service accounts to make credentials harder to crack and reuse. Apply MFA to all internet accessible remote access services, including web and cloud-based email, collaboration platforms, VPN connections, and remote desktop services.

extracted_playbook.title: Replace End-of-Life Equipment
extracted_playbook.description: Replace end-of-life equipment to ensure security and compatibility with current security standards.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult MITRE ATT&CK for Additional Mitigations
extracted_playbook.description: Consult the Mitigations and Detection sections on the MITRE ATT&CK technique web page for each of the techniques identified in the MITRE ATT&CK summary at the end of this advisory.
